data.persona: My pack is behind me. I am alpha. Now is the wolftime.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
This cave is situated along a mountainous trail. It is dark and damp. A cold air rushes through the walls of the cave.
There's a Wall, a Bone, and an a bear here.
The snake is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the snake
data.mid_motivation: I want to make an alliance with the snake to take down the bear today
data.long_motivation: Inplan to betray the snake in a few weeks
